problem: 如图,P为⊙O外一点,PA,PB分别切⊙O于A、B,CD切⊙O于点E,分别交PA、PB于点C、D,若PA=5,则△PCD的周长为()
answer: 解:∵PA,PB分别切⊙O于A、B,CD切⊙O于点E,∴PA=PB,CA=CE,DB=BE,∴△PCD的周长=PC+PD+CE+DE=PC+CA+PD+DB=PA+PB=2PA=2×5=10．故选:C．
comment: 本题考查了切线的性质:圆的切线垂直于经过切点的半径．运用切线长定理是解决问题的关键．
problem_en: As shown in the figure, P is a vertex outside ⊙O, PA and PB tangent ⊙O to A and B respectively, CD tangents ⊙O to vertex E, and crosses PA and PB to vertices C and D respectively. If PA = N_0, then △PCD perimeter is ()
